app.text_info: This app is created by locals and experts. As you can see, it's also free of charge. Please let us know if you want to contribute with your experience, enrich the content, correct inaccuracies, or submit pictures.
app.text_acknowledge: This quick app is an open-source project powered by open data and enriched by the community. Most of the information was extracted from Wikidata, OpenStreetMaps, and other public sources. You can find inaccuracies, so we apologize in advance.
app.text_feedback: Please let us know if you want to contribute with your experience, enrich the content, correct inaccuracies, or submit pictures. This app is created by locals and experts.

pois.name: Seimeira Waterfall
pois.description: A path that follows the river Agüeira, through a landscape characterized by meadows enclosed by stone walls (characteristic of the Oscos) and forests of chestnut and oak trees.
pois.more: A path that follows the river Agüeira, through a landscape characterized by meadows enclosed by stone walls (characteristic of the Oscos) and forests of chestnut and oak trees.

pois.name: Forge of Villanueva de Oscos
pois.description: The Mazonovo Ethnographic Ensemble, living witness of the iron industry of Santa Eulalia de Oscos, owes its name to a hydraulic iron drawing mallet that dates back to the 18th century and maintains its activity in the 21st century.
pois.more: The Mazonovo Ethnographic Ensemble, living witness of the iron industry of Santa Eulalia de Oscos, owes its name to a hydraulic iron drawing mallet that dates back to the 18th century and maintains its activity in the 21st century.

pois.name: Duxemiel
pois.description: Duxemiel is a family business of young entrepreneurs that aims to take advantage of natural resources through beekeeping, you will learn about the exciting world of bees with a guided tour, through Apitourism. In addition, it offers you all kinds of products, such as honey, pollen, wax, swarms, etc.
pois.more: Duxemiel is a family business of young entrepreneurs that aims to take advantage of natural resources through beekeeping, you will learn about the exciting world of bees with a guided tour, through Apitourism. In addition, it offers you all kinds of products, such as honey, pollen, wax, swarms, etc.
